title: EPAM
description: EPAM's brand colors present a vibrant and balanced palette that reflects innovation and professionalism. Dominating shades of teal (#39C2D7) and green (#A3C644) symbolize growth and creativity, while gray (#464547) offers a neutral base. The striking presence of red (#B22746) and magenta (#8E244D) introduces a dynamic energy. These colors are curated from their public-facing branding materials available online.
